data.why:
I have written Finance::Bank::CreditMut, a module that uses
    WWW::Mechanize to interface to French bank Credit Mutuel web site at
    https://www.creditmutuel.fr

    The structure of the module is based on Briac Pilpre's
    Finance::Bank::BNPParibas, in turn based on
    Finance::Bank::LloydsTSB, so as not to create yet another interface.
